# CAMP dataset

Import the CAMP dataset:

```{r}
camp <- read_excel("camp_2021 class project.xlsx")
```

Fill missing covariate values:

```{r}
camp <- fill(camp, c("Anypet", "Woodstove", "Dehumid", "Parent_smokes"), .direction = "down")
```
